hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We Are With You Every Step of the Way
hero.description: Your journey starts here. At Kaya, we believe that communication is not just a service; it is a bridge of trust between us and you. Whether you are looking for visa consultation, need to follow up on your application, or have any inquiry, our team is ready to assist you quickly and professionally.

hero.title: تواصل معنا
hero.subtitle: نحن معك في كل خطوة
